text:
Orna Porat (), born as "Irene Klein", (June 6, 1924 – August 6, 2015) was an German-born Israeli theater actress. She attended drama school and began her stage career at a repertory theater in Schleswig.
She moved to Mandatory Palestine in 1946, and converted to Judaism in 1957.
Porat died at the age of 91 on August 6, 2015.
